name: The Lobby (Driceyz)
description:
You enter the elevator as usual, but today was different, your glitched into a different dimension, while you try to find your way out, there is something coming towards you.

Please be ware of volume (Loud Sounds)

Assets: Quixel Bridge, poly haven, cg trader, poliigon.

Images: Dark Deception
